text: Bologna F.C. 1909 is an Italian professional football club from Bologna, Italy. It currently plays in Serie A. The club's home stadium is Stadio Renato Dall'Ara, which has a capacity of 38,000. Bologna was part of 75 Serie A seasons, which is the ninth-most in Italian football history. == Current squad == == League title == * Italian Football Championship / Serie A : 7 ** 1924/25, 1928/29, 1935/36, 1936/37, 1938/39, 1940/41, 1963/64 == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Serie A 9th 2001/02 Serie A 7th 2002/03 Serie A 11th 2003/04 Serie A 12th 2004/05 Serie A 18th 2005/06 Serie B 8th 2006/07 Serie B 7th 2007/08 Serie B 2nd 2008/09 Serie A 17th === Former position === ==Honours== ===Domestic=== ===League=== Serie A *Winners (7): 1924–25, 1928–29, 1935–36, 1936–37, 1938–39, 1940–41, 1963–64 Serie B *Winners (2): 1987–88, 1995–96 Serie C1 *Winners : 1994–95 ===Cups=== Coppa Italia *Winners (2): 1969–70, 1973–74 ===International=== Mitropa Cup *Winners (3): 1932, 1934, 1961 UEFA Intertoto Cup *Winners (1): 1998 Anglo-Italian League Cup *Winners (1): 1970 == References == Category:Italian football clubs Category:1909 establishments in Italy Category:Bologna
title: Bologna F.C. 1909
